search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Knack (knack.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Knack is: [https://www.knack.com/pricing](https://www.knack.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Starter     
 
 
Pro     
 
 
Corporate     
 
 
Enterprise         
 
 
 
 Core Capabilities   
 
 Online Relational Database   
Centralize all your data in an online RMDBS  
 
 Database Records   
Think of a record like a row in a spreadsheet or database table. Your record storage is the combined number of records that are stored in all of your databases.  
 
 Applications   
The number of apps you can build.  
 
 File Storage   
The total amount of files and images you can upload to your online database.  
 
 Record history   
View a history of each change to your records, including the change author, IP address, and highlights of changes. Retention period for this data varies by plan.  
 
 SSO   
SSO – Single Sign-On. Allow your users to log in with 3rd-party accounts. Advanced includes custom SSO providers and domain limiting.  
 
 IP Blocking   
Add specific IP addresses that can access the app. All others are blocked.  
 
 Automation and Integration – Flows   
Build Automations and integrate with 400+ existing platforms  
 
 Web Application Designer   
Design beautiful front end web application experiences  
 
 Users and Roles   
 
 App Users   
The users who have access to the published app you created  
 
 App Shared Builders   
The users you invite edit / build the structure of the app with you  
 
 Protected Pages   
Choose which pages you want to make visible to which Roles.  
 
 Custom Roles   
 
 # of Roles   
The amount of roles you can create for users of your app.  
 
 Mobile   
Responsive design and browser-based mobile access  
 
 Database   
 
 Data Import   
Import directly from CSV, Excel, Google Sheets  
 
 Data tables with custom fields   
Create flexible tables tailored to your data needs.  
 
 Users and Roles tables with custom fields   
Manage users in each app, and build custom Roles to assign to users  
 
 Connected tables (1-to-many, Many-to-many, and more)   
Link tables with 1-to-many, many-to-many, and other relationships  
 
 20+ field types   
Capture data with diverse field options like text, numbers, dates, files, formulas, and signatures  
 
 Export to .CSV, JSON, .txt   
 
 End-user data export   
 
 Data backups and restore   
 
 App Builder Logic and Permissions   
 
 Filter data by user & custom-fields   
Refine and display specific data sets based on tailored criteria, enhancing the ability to interact with and analyze information efficiently  
 
 Form presentation & submission rules   
Customize what fields show/hide on a form depending on inputs, and where to take users after submission  
 
 Page rules   
Customize which roles / users see what elements on a page  
 
 Action buttons   
Create custom buttons to trigger actions, go to specific knack pages, and visit external URLs  
 
 Bulk Editing   
Builders and Shared Builders can create, update, and delete data in large batches and with custom filters  
 
 Display Rules   
Dynamically show, hide, or format elements (like fields, buttons, and records) on a page based on conditions set by the user  
 
 Record rules   
Customize what data you want to add/edit on a newly created record  
 
 Conditonal Rules   
Set custom values in a given field when certain conditions are met  
 
 Validation Rules   
Ensure data accuracy by setting rules for input validation.  
 
 Branding   
 
 Custom Branding / Logo   
Company and Logo branding in your app  
 
 Custom Email Notifications   
Email sent from apps can be configured to your domain  
 
 Custom Domains   
Self Serve to connect your own domain to your app.   
 
 Custom CSS / Javascript   
 
 Building Blocks   
 
 App Template Library (Starter Apps)   
Explore 80+ template apps to learn from, or get your use-case off the ground quickly  
 
 Grid   
Create a grid view as rows and columns of data  
 
 List   
Create a list view from your data  
 
 Forms   
Creation of multi-step (or multi-part) forms, allowing users to complete lengthy forms in a step-by-step manner across multiple pages.  
 
 Rich Text   
Enrich your pages with advanced text editing, quotes, tables, images, videos, and more—fully customizable with HTML.  
 
 Details   
Customize which fields users see when they view individual records.  
 
 Search   
Empower your users to search a table in specific fields and with pre-set filters.  
 
 Calendar   
Display records with date or time information on a calendar for scheduling making it easy to interact with data organized by dates.  
 
 Maps and Geolocation   
Use Geo-Location to search for records by zip code and location.  
 
 Payments / E-Commerce   
Accept payments in your app via Stripe & Paypal, integrate your transactions, and more.  
 
 Dashboard / Reports   
Build powerful dashboards, reports, and charts from your data  
 
 Pivot Tables   
Organize and summarize your data dynamically to uncover insights, perfect for analyzing relationships and trends.  
 
 Bar/Column charts   
Visualize comparisons across categories with horizontal or vertical bars, ideal for highlighting differences in data.  
 
 Line charts   
Track trends or changes over time with lines connecting data points, perfect for time-series analysis  
 
 Pie charts   
Show proportions of a whole with a circular chart divided into segments, great for visualizing percentages  
 
 Area charts   
Highlight trends over time while emphasizing the magnitude of data with filled areas under the lines.  
 
 AI   
 
 AI App Builder   
Leverage AI to build the first version of your app including tables, fields, pages, charts, forms, buttons and more via a simple chat prompt. All in under 1 minute  
 
 Native integrations to leading AI services / LLM   
Native connector through Knack Flows to connect to OpenAI’s ChatGPT, Perplexity AI, Anthropic’s Claude, and Google Gemini  
 
 Automations / Integrations   
 
 Scheduled Tasks & Emails   
Easily build buik-tasks to update knack app records or send emails based on certain criteria, at daily / weekly / monthly intervals  
 
 Knack Flows (Automation and Integration platform)   
Knack offers an built-in iPaaS (i.e Make.com or Zapier) solution and set of free transaction entitlements in every Knack subscription. Additional Add-on entitlements available as you grow.  
 
 # of Flows   
Build flows from scratch, or start from pre-made templates  
 
 # of Built-in Integrations   
Knack-to-Knack automations and Integrations across 450+ systems & data transformation tools  
 
 Flows: Included Trigger-steps (Operations)   
The first step (trigger) in your flow never counts towards your Transactions!  
 
 Flows: Trigger intervals (Knack apps)   
How fast your flow will fire, if triggered by a Knack app  
 
 Flows: Trigger intervals (External systems)   
How fast your flow will fire, if triggered by an external system  
 
 Flows: Included Transactions   
Actions count towards your transaction amount  
 
 Flows: Error and Usage email alerts   
Real-time error alerts and transaction usage email alerts across all of your automations and integrations  
 
 Flows: Auto-add Transactions   
Choose to automatically add more Transactions if you use all of your planned Transactions, so that your business workflows are never disrupted  
 
 Knack API   
Knack offers a comprehensive API that gives builders/developers full access to update and customize Knack applications.  
 
 API Calls   
 
 Security / Compliance   
 
 SSO – Basic / Advanced SAML Based   
Enable secure login with single sign-on using SAML protocols  
 
 Record history   
Track changes to records with detailed version histories.  
 
 HIPAA / GovCloud   
Comply with healthcare and government data security standards  
 
 GDPR   
Choose to have your account based in our US, Europe, or Asia data-center  
 
 SOC2 Report Access   
 
 Support   
 
 App Consultations   
1 hour consultation with Knack’s in-house no code experts  
 
 Community Support   
 
 Case Based Support   
 
 Current Avg SLA/Uptime   
We design our infrastructure for high availability across our services. While this is not a guaranteed Service Level Agreement (SLA), we do offer custom uptime SLAs in our Enterprise plans, please contact us for more details.

FAQ  
 
 
 
 
What’s an app? A record? Or a database?   
 
 
We know some of the terms may be unfamiliar. We have some more info here on some of the common database terms.    
 
 
 
Do you charge by the user?   
 
 
No, there is no limit on users who can optionally log in and access your app. Each user just counts as a record stored in your database.    
 
 
 
Do you have setup fees or contracts?   
 
 
Nope, there are no fees or contracts with Knack. Create your trial account in seconds without entering a credit card. At the end of your trial you can select a plan and pay month-to-month.    
 
 
 
Can I use my own domain name?   
 
 
Absolutely! You can publish your app to your own website by using the embed features. Knack also provides a domain at knack.com for you to use.    
 
 
 
Can I change plans or cancel?   
 
 
On monthly plans, you can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your account at any time. Any upgrades or downgrades are automatically pro-rated for the next month. 
On annual plans, you cannot downgrade plans or change to monthly until your renewal date. Our annual plans offer deep savings of two free months which is 17% off the monthly subscription price.    
 
 
 
What kind of performance can I expect?   
 
 
Our plans are designed to be very responsive in almost all use cases. Because these plans do share cloud resources, it is possible that performance can be affected by heavy bandwidth or processing usage. Please inquire about our enterprise plans if you have performance concerns or need dedicated resources.    
 
 
 
What types of payment do you accept?   
 
 
We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, JCB, and Diners Club cards) on our website. We do not accept checks, PayPal, or bank transfers. 
     
 
 
 
Who owns the data stored in my app?   
 
 
You own it! Although the data is stored in Knack databases, you are the complete owner of your data and are solely responsible for its contents.        
 
 
 
Join the thousands of customers that trust Knack today

FAQ  
 
 
 
 
What’s an app? A record? Or a database?   
 
 
We know some of the terms may be unfamiliar. We have some more info here on some of the common database terms.    
 
 
 
Do you charge by the user?   
 
 
No, there is no limit on users who can optionally log in and access your app. Each user just counts as a record stored in your database.    
 
 
 
Do you have setup fees or contracts?   
 
 
Nope, there are no fees or contracts with Knack. Create your trial account in seconds without entering a credit card. At the end of your trial you can select a plan and pay month-to-month.    
 
 
 
Can I use my own domain name?   
 
 
Absolutely! You can publish your app to your own website by using the embed features. Knack also provides a domain at knack.com for you to use.    
 
 
 
Can I change plans or cancel?   
 
 
On monthly plans, you can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your account at any time. Any upgrades or downgrades are automatically pro-rated for the next month. 
On annual plans, you cannot downgrade plans or change to monthly until your renewal date. Our annual plans offer deep savings of two free months which is 17% off the monthly subscription price.    
 
 
 
What kind of performance can I expect?   
 
 
Our plans are designed to be very responsive in almost all use cases. Because these plans do share cloud resources, it is possible that performance can be affected by heavy bandwidth or processing usage. Please inquire about our enterprise plans if you have performance concerns or need dedicated resources.    
 
 
 
What types of payment do you accept?   
 
 
We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, JCB, and Diners Club cards) on our website. We do not accept checks, PayPal, or bank transfers. 
     
 
 
 
Who owns the data stored in my app?   
 
 
You own it! Although the data is stored in Knack databases, you are the complete owner of your data and are solely responsible for its contents.
